mapper.sql: GFTId, InCode, InName, InCoefficient, Place, Year
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_gfreference where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_gfreference
GFTId,
InCode,
InName,
InCoefficient,
Place,
Year,
#{gftid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{incode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{incoefficient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update tbl_gfreference set InCode = #{incode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InName = #{inname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InCoefficient = #{incoefficient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GFTId = #{gftid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
